system.description:
Starting at 3rd level, you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Errant Seer Spells table. The spells counts as ranger spells for you, but they do not count against the number of ranger spells you know.

 

Table: ERRANT SEER SPELLS

Ranger Level Additonal Spells Known
3rd @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.zzv2xb2kvvcyci4i]{Healing Word}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.kaye34nheyrit487]{Detect Magic}
7th @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.qsa7b22n3y1pbzf6]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.dnd5e-spells.Item.a7zibewl6e4kejvq]{Heartstrike}
13th @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.usz7we3sepg9tv9d]{Clairvoyance}
19th @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.3zt20n8mf29x3eju]{Death Ward}
